birth_place.zh-cn: 大明北直隶顺天府紫禁城
birth_place.en: Forbidden City, Shuntian Prefecture, North Zhili, Ming Dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 大明北直隶顺天府紫禁城乾清宫
death_place.en: Palace of Heavenly Purity, Forbidden City, Shuntian Prefecture, North Zhili, Ming Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十二位皇帝，明世宗朱厚熜第三子。年号隆庆。在位期间，采纳内阁建议，与蒙古俺答议和，并废除海禁，史称隆庆开关。其统治时期被称为隆庆新政。
description.en: The 12th emperor of the Ming dynasty, and the third son of the Jiajing Emperor. His era name was Longqing. During his reign, he adopted the suggestions of the cabinet, made peace with Altan Khan of the Mongols, and lifted the sea ban, an event known as the 'Longqing Opening'. His reign is known as the 'Longqing New Deal'.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十一位皇帝，明穆宗之父。
description.en: The 11th emperor of the Ming dynasty, father of the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十三位皇帝，明穆宗第三子。
description.en: The 13th emperor of the Ming dynasty, the third son of the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗的生母。
description.en: The birth mother of the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗长兄，明世宗次子。
description.en: The elder brother of the Muzong Emperor, and the second son of the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗之弟，明世宗第四子，曾有夺嫡之心。
description.en: The younger brother of the Muzong Emperor, and the fourth son of the Jiajing Emperor, who once had ambitions to seize the throne.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅，受明穆宗重用。
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming dynasty, who was heavily relied upon by the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅，受明穆宗重用并接受顾命。
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming dynasty, who was heavily relied upon by the Muzong Emperor and appointed as a regent.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁大学士，受明穆宗重用并接受顾命。
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming dynasty, who was heavily relied upon by the Muzong Emperor and appointed as a regent.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗统治时期所出现的承平时期。
description.en: A period of peace and stability during the reign of the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗于隆庆元年宣布废除海禁，允许民间私人远贩东西二洋的政策。
description.en: The policy enacted by the Muzong Emperor in the first year of his reign, lifting the sea ban and allowing private maritime trade.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗时期，明朝与蒙古俺答汗达成和平协议，俺答汗向明朝称臣纳贡，结束了双方长达二百年的战争。
description.en: During the Muzong Emperor's reign, the Ming dynasty reached a peace agreement with Altan Khan of the Mongols, wherein Altan Khan submitted as a vassal and paid tribute, ending two centuries of warfare.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古土默特部首领，与明穆宗议和。
description.en: Leader of the Tümed Mongols, who made peace with the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的一项锁国政策，禁止私人出海贸易。
description.en: An isolationist policy of the Ming dynasty that banned private maritime trade.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，与高拱、张居正一同接受明穆宗顾命。
description.en: A Ming dynasty official who, along with Gao Gong and Zhang Juzheng, was appointed as a regent by the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗元配妻子，裕王妃。
description.en: The first wife of the Muzong Emperor, who was the Princess of Yu.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗继妃，后为皇后。
description.en: The second wife of the Muzong Emperor, who later became the Empress.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗皇贵妃，明神宗生母。
description.en: The Imperial Noble Consort of the Muzong Emperor and the birth mother of the Wanli Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗长子，生母为裕王妃李氏（孝懿庄皇后），早夭。
description.en: The first son of the Muzong Emperor, born to Princess Yu (Empress Xiaoyizhuang), who died in infancy.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗第四子，生母为李贵妃（孝定皇太后）。
description.en: The fourth son of the Muzong Emperor, born to Noble Consort Li (Empress Dowager Xiaoding).

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由朱元璋建立。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, established by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的皇宫，明清两代的皇家宫殿。
description.en: The imperial palace in Beijing, serving as the royal residence during the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 明朝皇帝明穆宗朱载坖和其三位皇后的合葬陵寝。
description.en: The joint tomb of the Ming Emperor Muzong (Zhu Zaiji) and his three empresses.

description.zh-cn: 景王朱载圳有夺嫡之心，与时为裕王的朱载坖形成竞争关系，直至景王去世。
description.en: Prince Jing (Zhu Zaizhen) had ambitions to become the crown prince, creating a rivalry with Zhu Zaiji (then Prince of Yu) until Prince Jing's death.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗在明世宗驾崩后继承皇位。
description.en: The Muzong Emperor succeeded to the throne after the death of the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗在明穆宗驾崩后继承皇位。
description.en: The Wanli Emperor succeeded to the throne after the death of the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗重用内阁首辅徐阶。
description.en: The Muzong Emperor heavily relied on Grand Secretary Xu Jie.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗重用高拱，并任命其为顾命大臣。
description.en: The Muzong Emperor heavily relied on Gao Gong and appointed him as a regent.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗重用张居正，并任命其为顾命大臣。
description.en: The Muzong Emperor heavily relied on Zhang Juzheng and appointed him as a regent.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗临终前任命高仪为顾命大臣。
description.en: Before his death, the Muzong Emperor appointed Gao Yi as a regent.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗在位期间开创了隆庆新政。
description.en: The Muzong Emperor initiated the Longqing New Deal during his reign.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗于隆庆元年采纳建议，宣布废除海禁，史称隆庆开关。
description.en: In the first year of his reign, the Muzong Emperor adopted suggestions to lift the sea ban, an event known as the Longqing Opening.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗宣布废除海禁，允许民间私人进行海外贸易。
description.en: The Muzong Emperor announced the lifting of the sea ban, allowing private maritime trade.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗与蒙古俺答议和，促成了俺答封贡。
description.en: The Muzong Emperor made peace with Altan Khan of the Mongols, which led to the establishment of a tributary relationship.

description.zh-cn: 与蒙古俺答议和，结束长达二百年的战争。
description.en: Made peace with Altan Khan of the Mongols, ending two centuries of warfare.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖三十二年二月，册封为裕王妃。
description.en: In the second month of the 32nd year of the Jiajing era, she was made Princess of Yu.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖三十七年九月，选为裕王继妃。
description.en: In the ninth month of the 37th year of the Jiajing era, she was chosen as the second wife of the Prince of Yu.

description.zh-cn: 孝定皇太后（李氏）为明穆宗的皇贵妃。
description.en: Empress Dowager Xiaoding (née Li) was the Imperial Noble Consort of the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗去世后葬于明昭陵。
description.en: After his death, the Muzong Emperor was buried in the Zhaoling Mausoleum.
